sentences.en: A few scattered lights shone on the horizon.
sentences.cn: 地平线上闪耀着几处星星点点的灯光。

sentences.en: a widely scattered set of islands
sentences.cn: 分散得很广的一片群岛

sentences.en: Broken glass lay scattered on the carpet.
Copies of the local daily had been scattered on a table.
sentences.cn: 几份当地的日报散放在桌子上。

sentences.en: Every surface is scattered with photographs.
Everything breakable had been broken and scattered chaotically about the room.
sentences.cn: 房间里能打碎的东西都打碎了，一片狼藉。

sentences.en: He picked up the scattered toys.
sentences.cn: 他收拾好扔得到处都是的玩具。

sentences.en: Inside all was disorder: drawers fallen out, shoes and boots scattered.
sentences.cn: 屋内凌乱不堪：抽屉都掉落出来，鞋靴东一只西一只满地都是。

sentences.en: Scattered groans and whoops broke out in the crowd.
sentences.cn: 人群里不时发出几声抱怨和欢呼。

sentences.en: She tore the rose apart and scattered the petals over the grave.
sentences.cn: 她掰开玫瑰花，将花瓣撒在坟墓上。

sentences.en: The clothes were scattered round the room any old how.
The fridge door was open and food was scattered across the floor.
sentences.cn: 冰箱门开着，食物散落在地板上。

sentences.en: There will be some scattered showers (= short periods of rain ) in the afternoon.
There'll be bright or sunny spells and scattered showers this afternoon.
sentences.cn: 今天下午天气晴好，间有零星阵雨。

sentences.en: Tomorrow there will be a few scattered showers.
sentences.cn: 明天局部地区将会有阵雨。

words.tran_cn: 使散射；使散开，使分散；使散播，使撒播

trans.tran_cn: 分散的，零散的，疏落的，到处都是…的
trans.tran_en: spread over a wide area or over a long period of time
